DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate impact preoperative bladder underactivity treatment outcomes photoselective vaporization prostate ( PVP ) holmium laser enucleation prostate ( HoLEP ) treatment benign prostatic obstruction , compare two type surgery benign prostatic hyperplasia .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Bladder Underactivity Treatment Outcomes Laser Prostatectomy
DOC.criteria: patient 12month followup data available previous diagnosis urethral stricture prostate bladder carcinoma neurogenic bladder disease previous history urological surgery
